name: Animatronical chapter 1
description:
there are some shady businesses happening about some suspicious scientists building animatronics in a rent suburb house, you will go to investigate and collect some data of the animatronics to know the true goal of these scientists.

v1-only uycatroz will be ingame during this update and the night is only till 0:00am to 3:00

v2-crystally and skaile will be added to the game and the difficulty increased, the third ending will be created and the night will be from 9:00pm to 7:00am.

if youre a youtuber... make video when V2 release... it will be around august 5.

one more thing about this is... dont mind the V1 difficulty dont be so hard... v2 will be a lot harder because of the other two animatronics
